articles.author: Graeme Wearden
articles.title: Tech stocks surge as wave of interest in AI drives $4tn rally - The Guardian
articles.description: Shares in some firms involved in AI technology more than double in value as traders bet on massive growth in industry
articles.content: A rush of interest in artificial intelligence (AI) has helped to fuel a $4tn (£3.2tn) rally in technology stocks this year, with the US Nasdaq exchange reaching its highest level since last August in… [+12490 chars]
